Starscream

Starscream looked at Zardus.

"Take me inside. I have some information concerning Megatron. If you 
wish to let the Alliance continue to survive, you will listen to what 
I say."
______________________________________________________________________
Prebon

Prebon went to his quarters. This was excellent. They had a new 
member, and a hostage who they could torture to crush spirit. Plus 
the other Maximals will undoutably try a rescue plan. And when they 
do Savage will be ready to greet them. Plus the unstoppable force of 
Tamron! But now that he had made himself known, word would grow. 
Others may come looking. He needed a way to gain huge power and 
influence on this planet. If there was some way to plant a major 
leader with the chip, and weild power from behind the 
scenes.....That's it! The puppetmaster plan! Time to gain power!

Prebon set to work thinking how he could luer a major leader to him.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

The shuttle hovered above Earth's atmosphere and gave one final 
transmission to the Ark.

"Spears? Striker? Bluestreak? Anybody? The calvary's coming babay! 
Get ready to replenish the Ark!"

He turned to the others.

"Say a last prayer to the Matrix, boys. We could wind up dead yet."

Brix began to lower the ship. Instantly it sped up and started 
heating. The metal at the back was very hot, and began bending. A 
fire broke out inside and at the back of the shuttle.

"Ramulus, we nned you to put it out!"
